placeDesc: This unusual Industrial Park located in a residential neighborhood in Barcelona is guarded by a giant steel dragon sculpture that doubles as a slide.
placeShortDesc: A former steam-powered mill from the 1800s is now an industrial park with a giant steel dragon slide.
